name: v0.10.4-beta
body:
## What's Changed
* chore: bump nhost/dashboard to 0.14.1 by @nhost-build in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/643
* chore: bump actions/checkout from 3.3.0 to 3.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/642
* chore: bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 4.1.0 to 4.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/564
* chore: bump actions/setup-go from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/630
* chore: update dependencies by @dbarrosop in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/645
* chore: generate certificates daily and store them as secrets so they can be reused by @dbarrosop in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/646
* chore: fix pushing cert as secrets by @dbarrosop in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/647
* chore: fix release workflow by @dbarrosop in https://github.com/nhost/cli/pull/651


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nhost/cli/compare/v0.10.3-beta...v0.10.4-beta
